name: Noor Lucid Dreaming
description:
Enjoy this Noor lucid dreaming game

Noor lucid dreaming came up with an amazing and addictive puzzle for you. This game involves a hidden path of lucid kind of dream, where the lil girl experiences a silent age of never hood. Enroute the journey, she is entrapped like in a state of limbo which seemingly gives the idea of an arcade adventure, inside the little nightmare, she has this desire to escape.
This game involve a hidden paths solving them, you will be able to discover the new path.Focus on to find the clue and overcome the traps and puzzles. NOOR LUCID DREAMING game is a great combination of fun creative and adventure Execute the best possible plan to solve devious puzzles and riddles.Find hidden objects that help you to achieve goal.
It is also the funniest way to train your brain and keep your mind sharp.The best mind exercising game and requires complete concentration skills. Analyze every clue you discover and find the way out to solve puzzles,open combination locks, remove the rocks and lot more exciting puzzles to finally discover the only escape route.Your mission is to test your escaping skills at different locations by solving amazing puzzles and using all the objects around you to advance to the next stages.The best night games gives you a feeling of goosebumps as you roll on and Noor believes that she can survive in a challenging environment.Challenge yourself in this fun and addictive puzzle game.

Are you ready to make your own way to solving puzzles?

Features
• Tricky and challenging puzzles!
• Hidden objects
• Smooth one-tap controls
• It's FREE!
